import React, { useState, Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { bindActionCreators } from 'redux'; import { fetchLogin } from "../../../actions"; import { compose } from "../../../utils"; import { withApiService } from "../../hoc"; const LoginPage = ({loading, error, fetchLogin}) => { const [formIn, setForm] = useState({ login: "", pass: "", }) const inputChange = (event) => { console.log(event.target.name) setForm({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value, ...form }) } const sendForm = (event) => { event.preventDefault() fetchLogin(form) } return

} class LoginPageContainer extends Component { componentDidMount() { console.log('login') //this.props.login(); } render() { const { auth, loading, error, fetchLogin } = this.props; return ; } } const mapStateToProps = ({ authStatus: { auth, loading, error }}) => { return { auth, loading, error }; }; const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch, { apiService}) => { return bindActionCreators({ fetchLogin: fetchLogin(apiService), }, dispatch); }; export default compose( withApiService(), connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps) )(LoginPageContainer);
